Cambridge.Hiram Sands House: The Hiram Sands House is an historic house at 22 Putnam Avenue in Cambridge, Massachusetts. It is a ​2 1⁄2-story brick structure, three bays wide, with a side-gable roof. Its gable ends are fully pedimented in the Greek Revival style, but the heavy brackets and modillions on the cornice are Italianate features, as are the window hoods and front porch.
